name: Mrudhukoushik Gandi
bio: a passionate Full-Stack Java Developer with a strong focus on building scalable, high-impact applications. I specialize in cloud technologies like Azure, as well as containerization tools such as Docker and Kubernetes. Technical expertise includes TypeScript, HTML, Java, and frameworks such as Angular and Spring Boot. I have successfully delivered a variety of Angular and Java projects of different sizes on schedule while ensuring high-quality deliverables. Additionally, have excellent communication and interpersonal skills, and I thrive as a collaborative team player.
